title: Bytom
home_slide_title_des: A digital asset layer protocol is the infrastructure of asset Internet
home_slide_feature_part1_des: Consensus algorithm promotes AI techniques, calculation power actually using.
home_slide_feature_part2_des: Customize Your Smart contract, completely control assets, power the future of the economy.
home_slide_feature_part3_des: Digital Asset Atomic Transfer, high concurrent exchange, adaptable to different business environments.
home_video_des: Bytom Blockchain Protocol is an interactive protocol of multiple byteassets. Heterogeneous byte-assets that operate in different forms on the Bytom Blockchain.
home_bytom_des: Bytom blockchain adopts POW consensus algorithm to guarantee the security and decentralization of assets. Bytom’s side chain Vapor utilizes pluggable technology to realize different solutions. With the public chain and the side chain as infrastructure for commercial platform, the entire bottom layer of blockchain can be connected through an interactive protocol called Federation.
home_banner_title: Transfer Assets from Atomic World to Byteworld
dev_des: Committed to development of{br}Bytom blockchain ecosystem
dev_wallet_err_msg: Please input correct Bytom testnet address.
dev_wallet_des: Please input testnet address which is start from ‘tm’, here is Bytom Wallet official {download} and {intro}。
dev_tech_equity: Equity is a high level language for expressing Bytom’s smart contract, which is an interpreted language dedicated to demonstrate the Bytom multi-asset model’s contract.
dev_tech_vapor: Golang implemented sidechain for Bytom.The first link of Vapor  is the mainchain of Bytom, which will be slowly iterated in the following part. It will be connected with the mainchain of Bitcoin and Ethereum, and will become a project of universal side chain.
dev_tech_tensority: An ASIC-friendly Proof of Work Algorithm Based on Tensor.By adopting POW algorithm that is friendly to AI ASIC-chips, Bytom introduces matrix operations and convolution operations into hashing process of mining so that miners could be used for AI acceleration services after they are outdated.
wallet_desktop_des: Bytom wallet is the official full-node wallet highly recommended for miner, developer, enterprise and personal user.
wallet_step_1: Make sure that you have last version of Bytom Full-node Wallet and have enough free space in destination disk.
wallet_step_2: Download object file and make sure you close Bytom Wallet software.
wallet_step_2_1: For Windows users, replace object file in shortcut ‘%APPDATA%/Roaming/Bytom/data/core.db’
wallet_step_2_2: For Mac users, replace object file in shortcut ‘~/Library/*Application Support/Bytom/data/core.db’
wallet_step_2_3: For Linux users, replace object file in shortcut ‘~/.bytom/data/core.db’
wallet_step_3: Make sure that you set correct destination for datadir and replace object file to your downloaded bytom wallet folder.
wallet_mobile_bepal_des: Safe and easy to use with attractive interface
wallet_mobile_hoo_des: Use Hoo to achieve your ambition
wallet_mobile_cobo_des: Grow and protect crypto assets for everyone
wallet_mobile_hyperpay_des: The bastion of wallet Security.Watch your assets Grow.
wallet_bepal_des: Focusing on the safety of blockchain
dapp_title: All the applications come from the community,{br}welcome to develop your own applications on Bytom.
dapp_solutions_des_1: SeaRates is supposedly one of the most established logistics company based in the UK.
dapp_solutions_des_2: Bytomswap is decentralized digital asset trading platform based on Bytom. All kinds of digital assets can Bytomswap — exchange with “a basket of stable coins” backed by fiat currency and other assets.
dapp_solutions_des_3: Bluechain is a blockchain-based system designed to manage industrial water and waste resources in an efficient and transparent way.
dapp_solutions_des_4: Block Contract is a trusted transaction solution based on blockchain technology.
dapp_1_des: HOS platform is committed to creating a real and credible rental ecosystem and solving the painpoints in the housing rental market with the help of blockchain.
dapp_2_des: The project applies the idea of blockchain to manage the agricultural insurance operations.
dapp_3_des: EONE is a decentralized asset circulation platform based on Bytom, committed to data sharing of asset circulation as a middleware.
dapp_4_des: JoyIOT is an interactive prototype of Internet of Things (IOT) information based on Bytom, an example of the combination of blockchain and IOT.
dapp_5_des: JoyPub is a decentralized social network group application that integrates PPk open protocol and multi chains.
dapp_6_des: It is a blockchain-based advertising distribution platform, mainly focusing on helping advertisers distribute ads and luring users by games and incentives.
blog_title: Announcement, Project weekly report, article,{br}and videos about Bytom will synchronous update.
team_des: Bytom team are  experienced blockchain enthusiasts in tech,{br}marketing and operation. In blockchain we trust!

form_label_reward_des: 0%~100%,Allocation will be displayed in the voting page
form_label_logo: Please upload the LOGO of the organization/individual for Bytom 2.0 Block Producer:

modal_web_rule_2: Official votes should be more than your total number of early bird votes or you can't get early bird reward
modal_web_step_2: 2.Use sign-message command to sign the following message：

bounty_vision_des: As a part of our commitment to promote the Bytom ecosystem, we offer a comprehensive grants program focusing on funding software and tools, research and technical education aossciated with Bytom.
bounty_step_1_des: Determine the scope of your project
bounty_list_part_1_1: Sidechain Vapor Multilingual SDK (Java, C / C ++, Python ...)
bounty_list_part_1_2: Asset cross-chain (BTC, ETH cross-chain), Atomic swaps
bounty_list_part_1_5: Sidechain centralized node services (similar to infrua)
bounty_list_part_1_6: Sidechain Bapp integrated development environment (similar to remix)
bounty_list_part_2_1: Bottom layer research (consensus algorithms, UTXO models, etc.)
bounty_list_part_2_3: Protocol research (cross-chain protocols, layer 2 protocols, etc.)
bounty_list_part_2_5: Security research (cross-chain gateway security research, etc.)
bounty_list_part_3_1: Ntroduction videos/articles (Bytom main chain, side chain, Bystack, MOV, etc.)
bounty_list_part_3_2: Technical videos/articles (Bytom underlying protocol, consensus algorithm, network, smart contract, and cross-chain protocol for system introduction)
bounty_banner_subtitle: Show me your tech{br}Win up to 100,000 USD
bounty_faq_1_q: 1. How do I apply for a bounty task?
bounty_faq_1_a: As long as you have good ideas or want to try the tasks in the bounty list, you can apply at any time.
bounty_faq_2_q: 2. What are the requirements for applying for a bounty?
bounty_faq_2_a: The developed project needs to have a positive impact on the original ecology and comply with local laws and regulations Refer to the list of requirements for the bounty task for the scope of the project Generally required projects to apply for open source or part of open source.
bounty_faq_3_q: 3. Does the scope of the project have to meet the specified requirements?
bounty_faq_3_a: Not necessarily. If you have good ideas, you can consult with us at any time. The requirements list is just for reference.
bounty_faq_4_q: 4. What’s the average amount of the bounty?
bounty_faq_4_a: It depends on the workload such as the personnel and working days needed. No more than 100,000 USD for each project.
bounty_faq_5_q: 5. How is the bounty given to participants?
bounty_faq_5_a: The bounty will be given in batches in BTM tokens according to the project’s roadmap.
bounty_faq_6_q: 6. What can participants get in addition to the fund?
bounty_faq_6_a: Participants have priority to attend various events hosted by Bytom over the world and to be invited as a speaker. Participants have access to the latest Bytom swags and media exposure opportunity.
vapor_banner:
Vapor Pro：A high-performance
 sidechain of Bytom
vapor_banner_subtitle: Vapor is a layer 2 scalability solution that uses cross-chain technology to interact with the Bytom mainchain.  Compared to Ethereum, the Vapor sidechain boasts faster transactions, lower costs, and less risk of congestion.
vapor_slide_feature_part1_des: High-speed block generation, sidechain reaches 16,000 TPS
vapor_slide_feature_part2_des: Support for DEX, virtual machine, and other enterprise-level custom business modules.
vapor_slide_feature_part3_des: Consensus nodes participate in block generation and transaction matching.
vapor_node_eco_des: In order to better maintain Vapor network, Bytom foundation will spend 10 million BTM per year as node rewards, in which, 6 million will be deliver to BP(Block producer) Nodes, 4 million will be delivered to standby block producer nodes.
vapor_list_part1_des: The Block Producers are responsible for running the nodes and participating in block production
vapor_list_part2_des: If any Block Producer exits and the Standby Block Producer is promoted according to the number of votes.
vapor_list_part3_des: Contribute development and promotion resources to the Bytom Sidechain network and get votes from the community.
vapor_eco_part2_des: Realize efficient flow of external assets and sidechain assets
vapor_eco_part4_des: Provides oracle and random number services
vapor_node_des: To better maintain the Vapor network, Bytom Foundation plan to spend 10 million BTM per year as node rewards (amount adjusted every year).  This is comprised of 6 million BTM for Block Producer Nodes and 4 million BTM for Standby Block Producer nodes.
btm2_node_des: As Bytom 2.0 gets gradual improved and the launch of the testnet, it will start the recruitment of Block Producers. Any subject and individual who meets the selection criteria can participate in the node election and obtain reward. Bytom2.0 will elect 10 Block Producers based on the number of votes, and these 10 selected nodes will take turns to produce blocks. Bytom2.0 has no candidate nodes.
btm2_node_subtitle_1: Introduction to the key points of the Bytom2.0 consensus algorithm
btm2_node_des_1_0: When the Bytom2.0 blockchain is just started, the federated node is responsible for generating blocks, while other nodes can stake BTM to become Block Producers, and ordinary participants can vote on Block Producers.
btm2_node_des_1_1: Each voting and election round is called an "Epoch". An Epoch contains a set of blocks (for example, 100). In this Epoch, the Block Producers is fixed. The next Epoch starts to re-elect the Block Producers based on the number of votes.
btm2_node_des_1_2: When the next Epoch detects that there are legal Block Producers reaching a certain number, the federation node stops producing blocks and the Block Producers produce blocks.
btm2_node_des_1_3: Starting from the current Epoch, 1 block is generated every 6 seconds, and each Block Producer generates blocks in turn according to the number of votes.
btm2_node_des_1_4: Bytom2.0 does not verify each block, but uses Checkpoint as a unit for processing. Generally, block number of one Epoch  is used as a Checkpoint.
btm2_node_des_1_5: Bytom2.0 will confirm each Checkpoint twice, once the Checkpoint status is Justified after receiving 2/3 confirmation, and it can be overturned at this time, and after its subsidiary nodes are also confirmed as justified status, get the second confirmation and get the Finalized status, thus the final confirmation is obtained and cannot be overturned.
btm2_node_des_1_6: In order to prevent harmless attacks, Bytom2.0 will punish Block Producers that sign two blocks at the same height at the same time, and confiscate part of their staked BTM. Considering the complexity of the staked BTM, Bytom2.0 will introduce the mechanism gradually after the consensus gets stabilized.
btm2_node_des_2_0: Block Producer recruitment will be launched on, June 24, 2021, which will be open for long-term;
btm2_node_des_2_1: Candidates who meet the requirements can submit their applications immediately ( conditions can be viewed below);
btm2_node_des_2_3: After the candidate passes the audit, the website will publish the candidate information and real-time staking balance as well as the dynamic results of the candidate ranking.
btm2_node_des_3_0: Candidates participating in Block Producer recruitment must stake at least 1,000,000 BTM, the BTM is for breach of contract as PoS punishment. If the BTM reaches 0 because of evil deception, the candidate will lose the qualification (even if the number of votes is in the top ten);
btm2_node_des_3_1: You should have your own servers, Block Producer operation and maintenance technologies that can run Block Producers (please refer to the detailed rules below for specific software and hardware requirements);
btm2_node_des_3_2: A certain scale of community users will be priority;
btm2_node_des_3_3: Those who have contributed a lot of Bytom ecosystem will be priority;
btm2_node_des_3_4: Previously being sidechain Block Producer or candidate  Block Producer will be priority;
btm2_node_des_3_5: Node hardware, software, and network environment requirements
btm2_node_des_4_0: The profits of Block Producers are mainly from Block Production reward and transaction fees and the Block Production reward is limited to 30 million BTM.
btm2_node_des_4_1: Block reward = the number of blocks produced by the node * the reward for each block, the more the number of blocks, the more rewards, the node suspension caused by the failure or the network will affect the reward.
btm2_node_des_4_2: Ten consensus nodes divide the block reward equally, so each node can get up to 3 million BTM per year.
btm2_node_des_4_3: Bytom2.0 Bytom2.0 Block Producers produce blocks in turn, one block every 6 seconds, and each  Block Producer produce one block at a time.
btm2_node_des_4_4: ROI for Block Producers of every year is about 30%~60%.
btm2_node_des_5_0: Q1. How to determine the profits of Block Producers?
btm2_node_des_5_1: The profits are determined by voting and dividends, and depending on the block production of the Block Producers. Assuming the total lock-up amount is 100 million BTM, 1 million BTM from the Block Producers, and 800,000 BTM votes are obtained at the same time, and the dividend is 80%, then the Block Producers can gain the profit of 600,000 BTM every year, with 60% APR (BTM standard).
btm2_node_des_5_2: Q2. When will the Block Producers be rewarded?
btm2_node_des_5_3: The Block Producers will receive node rewards in real-time after the block is produced;
btm2_node_des_5_4: Q3. How often will the votes be counted and the ranking be updated?
btm2_node_des_5_5: Ranking will be updated once per round (about 100 blocks)
btm2_node_des_5_6: Q4.  How much is the dividend reward for voters?
btm2_node_des_5_7: The dividend rewards for voters are set by the Block Producers.
btm2_node_des_5_8: Q5. Can I withdraw my vote after the votes are enough?
btm2_node_des_5_9: No, PoS requires Block Producers to pay votes as deposits in case of doing evil.
